SELECT MOVIE_NO, TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'HH24:MI') MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_THEATER, TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') CHECK_TIME FROM MOVIE_SCHEDULE WHERE TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND MOVIE_TIME > SYSDATE
AND MOVIE_NO = ${movieNo} ORDER BY MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_THEATER

SELECT TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'HH24:MI') MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_THEATER, TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI') CHECK_TIME FROM MOVIE_SCHEDULE
WHERE MOVIE_TIME > SYSDATE
AND MOVIE_NO = ${movieNo} AND TO_CHAR(MOVIE_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') = ${date} ORDER BY MOVIE_TIME, MOVIE_THEATER

SELECT ROWNUM, MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, RUNNING_TIME, SYNOPSIS, NVL(RATIO_TO_REPORT(TICKET_COUNT) OVER(),0) AS RATIO, NVL(MOVIE_IMG_PATH, 'null') MAIN_POSTER FROM(SELECT P.MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, POSTER, RATING, RELEASE_DATE, RUNNING_TIME, SYNOPSIS, MOVIE_IMG_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(TICKET_NO) FROM TICKETING_INFO C WHERE P.MOVIE_NO = C.MOVIE_NO) TICKET_COUNT FROM MOVIE P LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG WHERE MOVIE_IMG_ROLE='메인슬라이드') I ON(P.MOVIE_NO = I.MOVIE_NO) WHERE SCREENING = 'C' ORDER BY TICKET_COUNT DESC, RELEASE_DATE)
